description: This hearty salad pairs roast squash with nutty parsnips, crunchy kale and creamy feta cheese with a sweet honey dressing making for a great flavoursome dish.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Fresh ingredients,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Parsnip,Vegetarian,Kale,Low fat
name: Roast Squash, Parsnip & Kale Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, peel parsnips and halve or quarter lengthwise. Place on an oven tray lined with baking paper. Drizzle with half the oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 10 minutes. Coat squash and kale with remaining oil. Add to tray with parsnip, drizzle with honey and continue to roast for a further 15 minutes until tender and golden.
Transfer to a serving platter. Top with almonds, feta, pomegranate arils and spring onion.
Whisk extra oil with white balsamic and drizzle over salad.
